resources.string: This a an example that wraps an underlined url https://github.com/StephenVinouze/LinkifiedTextView in the middle of the sentence
Here is a text containing several #hashtags such as #github or #LinkifiedTextView
You can even detect different types of #links with screennames @GitHub or emails somemail@mail.com and customize the link color
This is a text with the default Android font
This is a text with a custom font defined in assets/fonts
These following icons are generated via FontTextView using a iconic font and customized using color/size\'s TextView properties
